name: Forecards
description:
A LudumDare 49 Entry

Made by:

  • Jakub Janšta (Programming)
  • Martina Prokšová (Art, Sound)
  • Daniel Němec (Game design, Sound)
  • Alexandr Plata (Music) - Not made in the duration of the jam)

Why don't you FORECARD the unstable weather to some medieval folks out there?
